Body:
Description: Hi Team,
Customer have installed the EPP client on their Windows & MacOS machines. the total installed count is 179 computers. But users count is 194.

So, This what they need a clarifications from your end.

We tried to explain the details but customer need some more information from EPP support team regarding this Quey/Issue.

Please connect over the remote session with client and clarify /resolve this issue/query.

Also, they are installed EPP client on some other machines but machines are not reflected on the EPP dashboard. So, we asked them to provide a remote access of the users machine. Once they provided, We will do the Level 1 troubleshoothing and Will raise the ticket if the reported issue is not resolved.

Please take this User count is mismatching query/issue on High priority.

Regards,
Thanushree

What We've Learned Updated: User Count is mis-matching with the computers count
We confirmed:
- the Client Registration Certificate is off
- the Server Certifiate Stack is off

We
- reinstalled the epp client(3.0.3.1009) then restarted the computer - not seen in the UI
- installed version 3.0.4.1006 then restarted the computer - not seen in the UI
- deleted old clietn certifiate and downloaded the new certificate after server upgrade and imported it and set as always thrusted.
- client logs for both version show HTTP 200 suggesting the client can reach the server

- we performed the client reregistration procedure multiple times.
- observer several Mac computers have the same name
- on the test computer we changed the name and restarted the computer - not seen in the UI

Actual Results *
The computer is not seen in the UI.
Expected Results *
The computer is seen in the UI.
Steps to reproduce *
1. Install the Epp client
2. Update the policies on the client
3. Check if the computer is in the UI
